name: Dropbox Device Settings File
summary: A DEVICE file is a settings file that stores information about a USB storage device connected to a system running Dropbox, an online file storage service. It contains information Dropbox references to identify a device and its settings that configure how the storage service interacts with the device's contents. DEVICE files are hidden and stored in the root of the devices; users are not meant to open the files.
